edu.upenn.cis.ppod.thirdparty
Class ChainedInterceptor

java.lang.Object
  org.hibernate.EmptyInterceptor
      edu.upenn.cis.ppod.thirdparty.ChainedInterceptor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, org.hibernate.Interceptor
Direct Known Subclasses:
AccessInterceptor
public class ChainedInterceptor
extends org.hibernate.EmptyInterceptor

Implementation of the Hibernate Interceptor interface that allows the chaining of several different instances of the same interface.

From https://www.hibernate.org/92. html w/ modification suggested by the comments.

Author:
Laurent RIEU
See Also:
Interceptor, Serialized Form
